summary: An Ordinance providing for the improvement of East 53rd Street, from 9th Avenue Northeast to 10th Avenue Northeast; by paving and otherwise improving the same; all in accordance with Resolution No. 7694 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing that payment for said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment by Bonds."
